attributes.action: We refuse to pay the BBC TV licence fee and demand a refund - tired of bias reporting
attributes.additional_details: The BBC continue to present their bias reporting on Gaza. People are sick and tired of the blatant cover up of genocide, yet the BBC do not present the truth and wage in propaganda, which makes them complicit in these atrocities. The BBC have no morals and therefore we refuse to fund the BBC, we demand a refund for the fees paid and will not pay the BBC to tell us what we should think when it's so far from the truth.

rejection.details: This is not for HMT as this does not fall within our policy remit.  This would be for DCMS to consider.
